meanings.definition: A companion or fellow member of a group living in the same nest.
meanings.sent1: My nestmate and I always gather food together.
meanings.sent2: The bird and its nestmate built a cozy home in the tree.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel and its nestmate had a playful race around the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: The ants worked together like diligent nestmates, ensuring the nest was safe.
meanings.sent5: Having a loyal nestmate can make life in the wild less lonely.

meanings.definition: To share a nest with another individual.
meanings.sent1: The birds nestmate to keep each other warm during the cold nights.
meanings.sent2: The siblings decided to nestmate for the winter to save on rent.
meanings.sent3: The two kittens nestmated in the cozy basket, purring contentedly.
meanings.sent4: The rabbits nestmated under the bushes, creating a warm burrow.
meanings.sent5: The birds nestmating in the tree reminded me of the importance of companionship.
